title: Validator register never triggered when VC starts with inactive state validator keys
body:
<!-- 
By filing an Issue, you are expected to comply with the Code of Conduct, 
including treating everyone with respect:
https://github.com/Consensys/teku/blob/master/CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md

Not all sections will apply to all issue types.
-->

### Description
In Teku version 23.11.0, starting VC with a validator key in an inactive state does not initiate the validator registration even when it becomes active.


I reviewed the [changes](https://github.com/Consensys/teku/compare/23.10.0...23.11.0) between `23.10.0` and `23.11.0` and suspected that it was affected by [this commit](https://github.com/Consensys/teku/commit/35f97471d7f56a753197795550b739adf9354d58).

Logs with `23.10.0`
```
2023-12-01 06:25:01.347 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 7075325, Root: 6d30210b9d39e6a2323ec1219cfee697bd09d629e6a6772d3052da2795d076d6
2023-12-01 06:26:00.200 INFO  - Validator   *** 2 out of 2 validator registration(s) were successfully sent to the builder network via the Beacon Node.
2023-12-01 06:26:51.055 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 7075334, Root: 314b24dd70410c7b5a9e2c344f8070c965ade32e5389436c294d70ca90678073
2023-12-01 06:29:40.083 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 7075348, Root: 36c6d198a760bda513f1b7c9512edf65da21dc0be9e39d83bca0135f03051d5e
```

Logs with `23.11.0`
```
2023-12-01 06:23:04.084 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 7075315, Root: cdfb649fa61398d3b3482f7d1ba2cc76fee22623114a24b240a6632f2989e50b
2023-12-01 06:27:49.149 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 7075339, Root: f20a1e69fd6e17080ee9267ffddfed5496884e8a1f082fc935feef2b1fbfff35
2023-12-01 06:29:24.751 INFO  - Validator   *** Published attestation        Count: 1, Slot: 7075347, Root: 36c6d198a760bda513f1b7c9512edf65da21dc0be9e39d83bca0135f03051d5e
```

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. Start VC with `--validators-builder-registration-default-enabled=true` option
2. Import keys which are in an inactive state
3. Deposit ETH to the keys
4. Wait until keys become active and check logs

**Expected behavior:** VC starts validator registration process when some or every key becomes active

**Actual behavior:** VC does not initiate validator registration

**Frequency:** Always

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: [`teku --version` or look for log lines starting with `Teku version:`]
```
teku/v23.11.0/linux-x86_64/-eclipseadoptium-openjdk64bitservervm-java-17
```
* Java version: [`java -version`]
```
openjdk version "17.0.9" 2023-10-17
OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.9+9 (build 17.0.9+9)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.9+9 (build 17.0.9+9, mixed mode)
```
* OS Name & Version: [`cat /etc/*release`]
```
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=22.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=jammy
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS"
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS"
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION_ID="22.04"
VERSION="22.04.3 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish)"
VERSION_CODENAME=jammy
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy"
UBUNTU_CODENAME=jammy
```
* Docker Version: [`docker version`]
* Cloud VM, type, size: [Amazon Web Services I3-large]
